document.full_text: u.s. director darren aronofsky, who was nominated for an oscar this year for his dark ballet drama "black swan," will chair the jury of the aug 31-sep 10 venice film festival, organizers said on wednesday.
document.title: film-maker aronofsky to chair venice fest jury
lines_and_colors: u.s. director darren aronofsky, who was nominated for an oscar this year for his dark ballet drama "black swan," will chair the jury of the aug 31-sep 10 venice film festival, organizers said on wednesday.
